speaker: USER
text: I ordered a laptop 3 weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. I paid for express shipping! Order #89234
reason: Long delivery delay despite express shipping

speaker: AGENT
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me check your order status.

speaker: USER
text: This is ridiculous. I need it for work. I've been waiting forever and keep getting the runaround.

speaker: AGENT
text: I see your order is still in processing. It appears there was a warehouse backorder issue.

speaker: USER
text: Why wasn't I notified? And why did you charge me for express shipping if it's backordered?
reason: No notification and charged for unavailable service

speaker: AGENT
text: You're right, that's our mistake. I can process a refund for the shipping fee.

speaker: USER
text: What about the laptop? When will I actually get it? Can you expedite it?

speaker: AGENT
text: Unfortunately, the item is still on backorder. Estimated arrival is another 2 weeks.

speaker: USER
text: This is unacceptable. I want to cancel and get a full refund. Your service is terrible.

speaker: AGENT
text: I understand your frustration. I'll process the cancellation and full refund right away.

speaker: USER
text: Fine. I'll take my business elsewhere. Never ordering from you again.
reason: Customer leaving due to poor experience
